timeline.message: Combine both lines to a line

timeline.bodyText: Shall we remove this. IMO ballerina-lang should not use runtime package info.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha
warunalakshitha

timeline.bodyText: Shall we define BALLERINA_RUNTIME_PKG_ID inside stdlib. if not everytime we  change runtime package version , we need to build and release lang as well.
timeline.author: warunalakshitha

timeline.bodyText: since annotation is missing. Anyway shall we rename this to "Constants"
timeline.author: warunalakshitha
